title: Magnitude of angular momentum of particle

content.prompt: A particle of mass 2.0 kg is moving in the xy-plane at a constant speed of 0.80 m/s in the +x-direction along the line y = 4 m. As the particle travels from x = -3 m to x = +3 m, the magnitude of its angular momentum with respect to the origin is

unit.text: 6: Energy and Momentum of Rotating Systems

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
